item.description: Overview of learning topics Course Intro The aim of this course is to teach the fundamentals of CG by using Blender and Maya as the vehicle to learn.
Course Timeline Course Intro CG fundimentals Software packages 4. maya 5. blender 6. houdini 7. other basic modeling techniques advanced modeling techniques 1 course

item.title: CG Fundimentals
item.description: CG Fundimentals! CG Fundimentals What is CG? At it’s basics computer graphics is about data and manipulating that data.
